             java.util.Date invoiceDate,
             java.util.Date invoiceForMonth)
        Construct an InvoiceHeader.
        Parameters:
        businessName - name of business issuing invoice
        businessAddress - address of business issuing invoice
        client - client for the invoice with this header.
        invoiceDate - date of the invoice with this header.
        invoiceForMonth - month of billable charges for invoice with this header.
